problem.markdown:
Check your ability to answer some of the questions relevant to the simulation that you used.
1. In case of curved vane force on plate is equal to
( ) Force on flat plate (x) 2 x force on flat plate ( ) 1/2 x force on flat plate ( ) 4 x force on flat plate
2. Find the force exerted by a jet of water of diameter 75mm on a stationary flat plate, the jet strikes the plate normally with the velocity of 20m/s.
(x) 1767N ( ) 1707N ( ) 1677N ( ) 1776N
3. The horizontal component of the force on a curved surface is equal to
( ) Force on a vertical projection of the curved surface ( ) Weight of liquid vertically below the curved surface ( ) Product of pressure at its centroid and the area (x) Weight of liquid retained by the curved area.
4. In case of flat vanes the jet deflects at an angle of
(x) 90° ( ) 180° ( ) 45° ( ) None

2. Find the force exerted by a jet of water of diameter 75mm on a stationary flat plate, the jet strikes the plate normally with the velocity of 20m/s.

Weight of liquid vertically below the curved surface
Product of pressure at its centroid and the area
Weight of liquid retained by the curved area.
